title: St Peter Chanel Novena
description: Saint Peter Chanel was a Catholic priest, missionary, and martyr. Pray this novena for Oceania and for the courage to evangelize.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O God, Thou gave the Church St Peter Chanel as an example of holiness, crowning him with martyrdom. He showed the people of Oceania Thy gentleness, compassion, and love. Grant that in these days of paschal joy we may so celebrate the mysteries of Christ‚Äôs Death and Resurrection as to bear worthy witness to newness of life. We especially ask, through St Peter Chanel‚Äôs intercession, for the graces of (mention request here‚Ä¶) Through our Lord Jesus Christ, Thy Son, who lives and reigns with Thee in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever. Amen. St Peter Chanel, you left your homeland to proclaim Jesus, Savior of the world, to the peoples of Oceania. Guided by the Holy Spirit, who is the strength of the gentle, you bore witness to love, even laying down your life. Grant that like you we may live our daily life in peace, joy, and in love. May your prayer and example call forth from our midst many workers for the Gospel so that God‚Äôs kingdom may reach to the ends of the earth. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Peter Chanel, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
